Rulings.Edison: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Tengu:
●If you Tribute Set a high level Fiend-Type monster by Tributing this card, you CAN Special Summon another Skull Knight #2 from your Deck and you do NOT have to reveal your Set monster to prove it is a Fiend-Type.
●If you activate Change of Heart to control your opponent’s Skull Knight #2 and Tribute it to Tribute Summon a Fiend-Type monster you can Special Summon a Skull Knight #2 from your Deck. But if you activate Soul Exchange to Tribute a Skull Knight #2 on your opponent’s side of the field, neither player can activate its effect.
●If this card is used as a Tribute for a Special Summon, such as a Ritual Summon, the effect of this card is not activated.
●If the Tribute Summon of a Fiend-Type monster is negated by Solemn Judgment or Horn of Heaven, the effect of Skull Knight #2 will not activate.
●If the opponent chains Torrential Tribute to the effect of Skull Knight #2, all monsters will be destroyed (including the Level 5 or higher Fiend-Type monster that was Tribute Summoned) and then Skull Knight #2 will be Special Summoned from your Deck. If the opponent waits until the effect of Skull Knight #2 resolves and another copy is Special Summoned, and then activates Torrential Tribute in response to that Summon, all the monsters will be destroyed.

But if you activate Soul Exchange to Tribute a Skull Knight #2 on your opponent’s side of the field, neither player can activate its effect.

If the opponent waits until the effect of Skull Knight #2 resolves and another copy is Special Summoned, and then activates Torrential Tribute in response to that Summon, all the monsters will be destroyed.

Rulings.Stein:
● If you Tribute Set a high level Fiend by Tributing this card, you CAN Special Summon another 'Skull Knight #2' from your Deck and you do NOT have to reveal your Set monster to prove it is a Fiend-Type.
● If you activate 'Change of Heart' to control your opponent’s 'Skull Knight #2' and Tribute it to Tribute Summon a Fiend you can Special Summon a 'Skull Knight #2' from your Deck. Rulings.Base:
1. If you Tribute Set a high level Fiend-Type monster by Tributing this card, you CAN Special Summon another "Skull Knight #2" from your Deck and you do NOT have to reveal your Set monster to prove it is a Fiend-Type.
2. If you activate "Change of Heart" to control your opponent's "Skull Knight #2" and Tribute it to Tribute Summon a Fiend-Type monster you can Special Summon a "Skull Knight #2" from your Deck. But if you activate "Soul Exchange" to Tribute a "Skull Knight #2" on your opponent's side of the field, neither player can activate its effect.
3. If this card is used as a Tribute for a Special Summon, such as a Ritual Summon, the effect of this card is not activated.
4. If the Tribute Summon of a Fiend-Type monster is negated by "Solemn Judgment" or "Horn of Heaven", the effect of "Skull Knight #2" will not activate.
5. If the opponent chains "Torrential Tribute" to the effect of "Skull Knight #2", all monsters will be destroyed (including the Level 5 or higher Fiend-Type monster that was Tribute Summoned) and then "Skull Knight #2" will be Special Summoned from your Deck. If the opponent waits until the effect of "Skull Knight #2" resolves and another copy is Special Summoned, and then activates "Torrential Tribute" in response to that Summon, all the monsters will be destroyed.
